actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-768.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 5313) making appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for sundry independent agencies, boards, commissions, corporations, and offices for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1987, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 5313 (Department of Housing and Urban Development and other agencies appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 5313) making appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for sundry independent agencies, boards, commissions, corporations, and offices for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1987, and for other purposes.
